definitions: The action of exerting force on someone or something in order to move them away from oneself.
The action of promoting or advocating for something.
The action of urging or encouraging someone to do something.
The action of extending oneself to the limit or beyond.
examples: He was pushing the door open.
They are pushing for new legislation.
She's always pushing her children to succeed.
The team is pushing hard to meet the deadline.
